spec_data.Name: perl-Test-POE-Client-TCP
spec_data.Description:
Test::POE::Client::TCP is a POE component that provides a TCP client
framework for inclusion in client component test cases, instead of having
to roll your own.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 04:51:46 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: POE Component providing TCP client services for test cases
